text: 5.10: 2 Ko 4.17; 1 Te 2.12; 2 Te 2.17; 1 T 6.12; Hi 13.21; 1 Pi 1.6Fhe Bakɨme ana mbarkɨrga kora muumbara, ana za ntan nɨɨŋge ma. Ana Krais Zisasan zɨn panan, ana nden kamgi. Nde ana phorgɨp, ana ŋkasŋka vhuuŋ bakɨme, ana zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki, nde ana phorgɨp, anan vhen kɨrga. Maaŋ muuŋgip, nde tuga tɨvaneŋra, nde zaa ndigirga. Ana zumgum nden muuŋgirim, nde nzerarga. Nde ana khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk, ana anan havhargip, nden kurarim, nde ndɨkndɨgi havhargip, nde zazera thɨgɨ havhargirga.
